identification.description: Collateralization Level. Indicates whether the trade is collateralized at            the individual trade level, the portfolio level, or position level.

codes.description: Code indicates collateralized exposure calculated on a set of trades or                    transactions (more than 1) identified by a portfolio ID. The collateral exposure                    is based on the net position of the combined set of transactions rather than on                    a trade-by-trade basis. Value matches to CPMI-IOSCO CDE, CFTC Part 45 (2019),                    EMIR, and MIFID 'Portfolio' values, and to SFTR 'Collateralisation of net                    exposure' = 'True' value.

Code indicates collateralized exposure calculated on a trade by trade                    basis. Value matches CPMI-IOSCO CDE, CFTC Part 45 (2019), EMIR, and MIFID                    'Trade' value and to SFTR 'Collateralisation of net exposure' = 'False'                    value.
